description:
This course works its way through all of Geometry. More than 70 videos are included.

You'll learn about quadrilaterals, triangles and circles, three-dimensional geometry and the basics of figures and angles, logic and proofs, parallels and polygons, triangle congruence, shapes in space, and dilations and scale factors.

This course should be taken after you've completed Fundamentals of math and Algebra, and before you start the Calculus series.
title: Become a Geometry Master
